trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Liberty
There were no other sightings in Liberty on or around August 7th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailshad bought a new mini dvr to put on model aircraft for airborne videos. when I downloaded video, from that days flying, I discovered this object at 2.21mins into video, I did not see it from point of view at ground level, even though, I had aircraft in my line of sight at all times. I do not know if dvr is IR capable, further investigation is needed to see what dvr is capable of recording
